Articles.Content:
So, I built a Concorde copy called the Konkorde that flies great, except for one thing.

Ever since the redo of ASAS, something's odd. I use the reaction wheels for everything because they gently push my plane into the air which is nice, but the new problem is as it takes off it flips right over, then flips back within 3 seconds, it's not a problem, its just annoyance.

It's on all my planes, so it isn't Konkorde.

Thanks,

whiterafter.
Pics of the ship would probably help. In the SPH, with the COM/COL markers showing.
